item.title: Click commands in quest tab closed
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

public void q1help() { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) if(playerHasItem(995, 1000000000)){ addSkillXP(14000000, i); deleteItem(995, 1000000000); sM("You maxed out all your stats for 1 billion coins!"); } else sM("You need 1 billion coins to get maxed out skills!"); }
thats my code, it works but it says You need 1 billion coins to get maxed out skills! like 8 times

any way to make it say it only once?

EDIT: had to change my code around to this

public void q1help() { if(playerHasItem(995, 1000000000)){ for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) addSkillXP(14000000, i); deleteItem(995, 1000000000); sM("You maxed out all your stats for 1 billion coins!"); } else sM("You need 1 billion coins to get maxed out skills!"); }
Btw, other code made 1 billion coins per skill LOL

Read full topic
